Macro Definition Documentation

◆ exec_cb

#define exec_cb (   _callback_)
Value:
do { \
if( _callback_ == NULL ) \
{ \
while(1); \
} \
else \
{ \
_callback_( ); \
} \
} while(0);

safely execute call back

◆ TimerInit()

void TimerInit ( TimerEvent_t *  obj,
void(*)(void)  callback 
)

Initializes the timer object.

Remarks
TimerSetValue function must be called before starting the timer. this function initializes timestamp and reload value at 0.
Parameters
[IN]obj Structure containing the timer object parameters
[IN]callback Function callback called at the end of the timeout
